name: Swarms of SPLORR!!
description:
Its like Vampire Survivor! But text based!

You can move. Dunno why you'd want to.

You can attack. You should prolly do this.

You can take XP. You should also do this.

You can rest. You should whenever you can.

There's not a lot of depth here, but in working on this, it hints at a greater work where upon level up there is choice about how to upgrade yer character.

There are 1000 enemies.

You won't last.
